property.caption: Notification Entity
property.description: Select the entity that represents a notification

property.caption: Retrieve Microflow
property.description: Microflow that will retrieve and load the notifications

property.caption: Type
property.description: Attribute that controls the type of notification (success | info | warning | error)

property.caption: Title
property.description: Attribute containing the notification title

property.caption: Message
property.description: Attribute containing the notification message

property.caption: Close Button
property.description: Attribute that controls if a close button should be shown

property.caption: Progress Bar
property.description: Attribute that controls if a progress bar should be shown

property.caption: Tap To Dismiss
property.description: Attribute that controls if the notification should close when the user clicks it

property.caption: Position Class
property.description: Attribute that controls the position of the notification (toast-top-right | toast-bottom-right | toast-bottom-left | toast-top-left | toast-top-full-width | toast-bottom-full-width | toast-top-center | toast-bottom-center)

property.caption: Show Duration
property.description: Attribute that controls the show duration, in milliseconds

property.caption: Hide Duration
property.description: Attribute that controls the hide duration, in milliseconds

property.caption: Timeout
property.description: Attribute that controls the initial timeout, in milliseconds

property.caption: Extended Timeout
property.description: Attribute that controls the extended timeout, in milliseconds

property.caption: Close Button
property.description: Whether a close button should be shown

property.caption: Progress Bar
property.description: Whether to show the progress bar or not

property.caption: Tap To Dismiss
property.description: Whether the notification can be closed by tapping it.

property.caption: Type
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Position Class
property.description: Where the notification should be positioned

property.caption: Show Duration
property.description: The show duration, in milliseconds

property.caption: Hide Duration
property.description: The hide duration, in milliseconds

property.caption: Timeout
property.description: The initial timeout, in milliseconds

property.caption: Extended Timeout
property.description: The extended timeout, in milliseconds

property.caption: Load Notifications
property.description: Attribute that controls whether the notifications should be loaded

property.caption: Show Easing
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Hide Easing
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Show Method
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Hide Method
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Prevent Duplicates
property.description: Whether duplicate notifications should be shown.

property.caption: Newest On Top
property.description: Whether a new notification should be shown above the previous.

property.caption: Debug
property.description: Whether to write the notification object to the console.

property.caption: On Click
property.description: Microflow that will be run when a notification is clicked

property.caption: On Close Click
property.description: Microflow that will be run when a notification's close button is clicked

property.caption: On Hidden
property.description: Microflow that will be run when a notification closes.

property.caption: On Shown
property.description: Microflow that will be run when a notification opens.

property.caption: Toast Class
property.description: The class to apply to the notification, e.g. alert

property.caption: Error Icon Class
property.description: The class to apply to the notification's error icon, e.g. alert-danger

property.caption: Info Icon Class
property.description: The class to apply to the notification's info icon, e.g. alert-info

property.caption: Success Icon Class
property.description: The class to apply to the notification's success icon, e.g. alert-success

property.caption: Warning Icon Class
property.description: The class to apply to the notification's warning icon, e.g. alert-warning
